A wormhole (or Einstein–Rosen bridge or Einstein–Rosen wormhole) is a speculative structure linking disparate points in spacetime, and is based on a special solution of the Einstein field equations.

A wormhole can be visualized as a tunnel with two ends at separate points in spacetime (i.e., different locations, different points in time, or both).

Holy crap. Honestly, I've played some GOOD puzzle games, but god danm.
Portal is such a gem. The game really holds up well, both gameplay and graphic-wise.
Glados is also such an amazing and funny villian, she's amazing. 

This game is way too cheap for what it's worth, it's such an amazing journey.
I don't think there'll ever be a game like this (Other than Portal 2 of course)

Oh yeah! And it started the whole "The cake is a lie meme" which is pretty neat.
Just buy the game already, honestly.

While not as good as the 2nd game, it's still a good game. The level design is pretty good, and it does take advantage of the physics along with portal well. The levels are pretty simplistic once you understand what to do, but that's fine. I think the part where you escape from glados's planned end and get to glados and fight her are really cool and really fun. So yeah, not as good as its sequel but still good and fun for sure.

I like everything about this game, the game puzzles, sound's effects, game play, and of course the ending cake :)

Старый добрый Портал.

Первый Портал -- это та игра, которая отполировала концепцию механики двух порталов, реализовав её в полноценный проект и став в своём роде культовой в жанре головоломок, даже учитывая тот факт, что сиквел её превосходит во многих аспектах, без неё бы не существовало продолжения, заложив этакий фундамент этой интересной серии игр от Валв.

И помните, друзья то, что торт -- это ложь.

GOOD

Probably the best FPS puzzle game ever made, hands down. Truly a game unique all by itself and created a whole new way of playing games and problem solving. There really aren't any other games like it and that alone makes it worth owning. This game isn't a normal FPS shooter, it's a problem solver game disguised as a FPS shooter. There are no actual guns, other than the portal gun that opens up portals allowing you to travel through them to meet your destination. For anyone who enjoys a challenging puzzle, it's a piece of cake.
